description: Updates the cluster with the configuration that is specified in the request body.

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the cluster.

parameters.name: ConfigurationInfo
parameters.description: Represents the configuration that you want MSK to use for the brokers in a cluster. ARN of the configuration to use. The revision of the configuration to use.

nested_params.name: Arn
nested_params.description: ARN of the configuration to use.

nested_params.name: Revision
nested_params.description: The revision of the configuration to use.

parameters.name: CurrentVersion
parameters.description: The version of the cluster that needs to be updated.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster operation.
